description: Don Henley performs his greatest hits live in Dallas.
name: Don Henley: Live Inside Job

review.name: A great night in!!
review.reviewBody: I watched this video in DTS and it felt like i was at the concert.Every song was performed to perfection but i wasn't quite sure what to make of his jazzed-up rendition of Hotel California,for me this song can only be performed one way..For a really great night in ,invite a few friends round for dinner followed by a nice bottle or two of wine,then throw in your copy of The Eagles-When hell freezes over,to get everyone in the mood for some great music,then round the evening off with some Don Henley,everyone will love you for this,especially if ,like me ,you throw it up on your projection screen.Your friends will thank you for taking them to a great concert..in general this is a great DVD and well worth adding to your collection of music DVD's..
